amendment.description: To amend title 18, United States Code, to protect Americans from cybercrime.

action.text: Amendment SA 2626 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2626.

Amendment SA 2626 proposed by Senator Feinstein for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 2716. (consideration: CR S7335-7336, S7339-7340; text: CR S7335-7336; text as modified: CR S7339-7340) To amend title 18, United States Code, to protect Americans from cybercrime.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2626 proposed by Senator Feinstein for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 2716.
